title: Psidium guajava
Vernacular name: English- Guava </br> Hindi- Amrood </br> Gujarati- jamfaal </br> Sanskrit- Amratafalam, Perala </br>
Chemical Constituents: alpha pinene, beta pinene, isopropyl alcohol, methanol, terpenyl acetate, caryophyllene
Therapeutic uses: effective in diarrhea, dysentery, gastroenteritis, hypertension, diabetes, caries, pain relief, cough, oral ulcers and to improve locomotors coordination and liver damage inflammation
